mapper.select: select sr2.* from sec_user su,sec_role sr,sec_role_res srr,sec_res sr2 where su.role_id=sr.id and sr.id=srr.role_id and sr2.id=srr.res_id and su.id=#{id}
select sh.* from sec_hospital sh,sec_hospital_relation shr ,sec_user su where sh.id=shr.hospital_id and shr.admin_id=su.id and su.id=#{id}

SELECT u.id as id, hu.id as huId ,h.id as hospitalId, u.username,u.disabled, u.phone,h.hospital_name,r.role_name,u.role_id FROM sec_user u, sec_hospital_user hu, sec_role r,sec_hospital h WHERE u.id=hu.admin_id and hu.hospital_id=h.id and u.role_id=r.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_user (createtime,username,role_id,phone,id) VALUES(now(),#{username},#{roleId},#{phone},#{id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE createtime=now(),username=#{username},role_id=#{roleId},phone=#{phone},id=#{id}
